name: Junhee Seok
content: CDAL, Korea UniversitySearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationCOMPLEX DATA ANALYTICS LAB. Welcome to Complex Data Analytics Lab Homepage.Our research is developing and applying computational methods to analyze complex and large-scale data. These days, we are facing the explosion of big data, such as finance data, sensor data generated in IoT systems as well as genome information, which has brought an unprecedented opportunity to significantly advance human knowledge and improve the life quality. Since such big and complex data are hard to be efficiently handled by conventional analysis methods, it is critical to develop innovative analysis tools based on Artificial Intelligence (AI), the machine learning techniques and up-to-date computational technology. By analyzing big data with using these techniques, we are pursuing to develop the advanced automatic systems that can enhance the life quality. Google SitesReport abusePage detailsPage updated Google SitesReport abuse
